Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: a1708 820-00875-a  20v 03-04amps
threads.message:
hello my problem is  pp3v3_s5 short when check in diode mode.  
 and ppv5_s5 upon voltage check  no output voltage.

maybe cpu prob or maybe not the cpu..

thanks advice me...

threads.title: a1708 820-00875-a  20v 03-04amps
threads.message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Short to ground on L7690, will block U7650.
Best way to find the culprit is voltage injection.
Start with 1V and slowly increase (only if needed), no more than 4V.
First, set the amp limit of lab PSU to max.

threads.title: a1708 820-00875-a  20v 03-04amps
threads.message:
upon checking 

pp3v3_s5 inject all temp  cpu

threads.title: a1708 820-00875-a  20v 03-04amps
threads.message:
Is the hotest spot on the PCH die?
In such case, changing processor is the only solution.
